document_data.name: Spirit Lodge
document_data.mainbody: '''Spirit Lodge''' was a temporary lodging for [[green elf|green elves]] in [[Leuthilspar]] on the island of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Description: The lodge was a long building surrounded by trees. It was grown from different types of trees and painted externally with [[elf|elven]] designs.
document_data.Activities: At the lodge, it was agreed that the rivalries between these elves would be set aside while staying at the lodge, and it was almost never unoccupied.
